If you want logos every now and then and you are tired of finding the right graphic designers for this job, then it’s time to take the game in your own hands! The Picasso AI Logo Generator is your all-in-one solution for creating professional logos that stand out.

Picasso AI Logo Generator lets you craft both graphic logos and text-based logos. Just like generative AI models, this app also asks you to provide a prompt and generate a logo of your choice. However, it still gives you the option to choose logo style and color scheme that you can utilize to match your brand’s identity.

We know that coming up with the right prompt can sometimes be tricky. That’s why the Picasso AI logo generator includes a prompt inspiration feature. By selecting this option, users can access pre-written prompts designed to spark creativity. It will help you set up the tone or understand how to write the right prompt to generate your desired emblem.

As you describe your vision in the prompt, our advanced AI engine analyzes the input to generate a unique, high-quality logo.
If you’re not satisfied with the initial result, don’t worry! The Regenerate button allows you to create new variations of the same logo instantly. Alternatively, you can modify your prompt and generate a completely fresh design. This iterative process ensures that you end up with a logo that meets your expectations perfectly.

This app boasts a variety of features for your assistance. Some of the prominent ones are discussed below:
 
Picasso AI logo generator has a user-friendly interface, which makes it intuitive and easily accessible for everyone.
It is based on advanced AI technology that ensures your designs are unique, visually appealing, and professional-grade.
This app offers results instantly, saving users valuable time and effort.
It offers a ‘Try On’ feature, which makes it easy to see how your logo will look on physical objects.
You can keep track of the logos you have generated in history.
The app also contains AI services, which can help you remove background from images, upscale them, and enhance their quality.
 
The Picasso AI image generator app makes it effortless for everyone to download their logos. After finalizing your logo, you can tap the download button to save it in the gallery. In addition, you can share it across social media platforms or email it with a single click. This seamless integration ensures that your logo is ready to use wherever you need it.
 
So, why spend hours or even days designing a logo when this AI logo generator can do it in seconds? Download this app now and experience the future of logo design!

Light Studio – AI Image Generator & Photo Editor
Unlock your creative potential with the most advanced AI-image-generation app for iOS. Turn simple prompts into stunning visuals, edit photos like a pro, and share your creations with the world.

--> Why Light Studio will change how you create

- Generate high-quality AI images in seconds: describe your vision and watch our intelligent engine bring it to life.
- Edit existing photos with ease: background removal, object eraser, portrait retouch, style transfer and more.
- Create custom visuals for social media, content marketing, e-commerce or personal art.
- No design skills required — perfect for creators, photographers, marketers, small businesses.
- Unlimited editing possibilities: mix text-to-image, photo-to-art, and combine advanced filters and effects.
- One-tap transformation into cartoons, 3D figurines, fine-art, vintage style or cinematic visuals.
- Optimised iOS experience – super fast rendering, seamless sharing, custom resolution exports.

--> Core Features:

- Text-to-image generation: Type a prompt and instantly generate a unique image — ideal for AI image generator, AI art creator, image from text.

- Background remover & scene changer: Remove unwanted objects or replace backgrounds in one tap — background eraser, object remover, one-tap photo edit.
- Portrait retouch & enhancement: Enhance skin, eyes, lighting, clarity — “portrait retouch”, “selfie editor”, “photo enhancer”.
- Design templates & mockups: Create professional visuals for social posts, adverts, e-commerce products — “social media image maker”, “product mockup generator”.
- Creative filters & style transfer: Apply artistic styles, vintage film look, or turn a picture into a cartoon or 3D figurine.
- Ultra-fast rendering & sharing: Export to HD, share to Instagram, TikTok, Facebook; optimised for iPhone & iPad.

--> Why you’ll love it:

- No manual mask creation or complicated layers — just type your idea, and watch the magic.
- Get pro-level quality without the pro-level skills — perfect for beginners and advanced alike.
- All in One app which covers image generation, photo editing, and creative transformation — no need for multiple apps.
- An intuitive interface built for iOS — spend less time learning, more time creating.
- Regular updates with new styles, templates, themes and community assets.

--> Showcase Use-Cases:

“Create a surreal fantasy portrait of my pet in a digital painting style.”
“Remove the background and replace it with a cinematic cityscape for my brand promo.”
“Turn this product photo into a lifestyle mockup for my Etsy store.”
“Convert my selfie into a 3D figurine style avatar for social media.”
“Generate a batch of AI art images for my blog header using text prompts.”

--> Ready to transform your photos and unleash creativity?

Download Light Studio now and start generating stunning visuals in seconds. Say goodbye to complex tools and hello to effortless, inspiring creation.

Easily redesign your home in a variety of stunning styles using advanced AI technology.​​ Home AI brings the expertise of an interior designer right into your pocket!

【Home AI is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to:】

Explore a vast library of interior design styles and discover their perfect aesthetic

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
